meanings.definition: A person who makes a facial expression of pain or disgust.
meanings.sent1: The grimacers in the haunted house looked terrified.
meanings.sent2: The actor's performance was so convincing that he was mistaken for a grimacers.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the silly faces of the grimacers in the comedy show.
meanings.sent4: The grimacers in the painting seemed to come to life with their expressions.
meanings.sent5: The photographer captured the perfect moment of the grimacers in the crowd.

meanings.definition: To make a facial expression of pain or disgust.
meanings.sent1: She grimacers whenever she tastes something bitter.
meanings.sent2: The villain grimacers as he sees his evil plan failing.
meanings.sent3: The baby grimacers when trying a new food for the first time.
meanings.sent4: The old mirror grimacers back at me with its cracked surface.
meanings.sent5: The actor grimacers dramatically to convey his character's emotions.
